website_summaries.verdict: A basic model with a nice feature set and attractive price, though there are some operational and quality concerns.
pros: User-friendly features include muted dial control, micro-organism filtration system, and 360 degree mist distribution
cons: Not as quiet as others, and it requires frequent refilling
A few reports of leaks and malfunctions after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the package I thought they were too small to last very long on the high setting but on average they’ve been going strong for 18-24 hours at a time before needing to be refilled. I imagine in the winter that time will go down because of the drier air. The stream is strong and goes upward instead of all over the floor like other brands I’ve tried. Very happy with these (I got two).
customer_reviews.author: Doodle Bird Terrariums

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints so far. It is a nice easy to use humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Best humidifier ever used! Love it
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier is very modern and well designed.I like that the unit came with an extra filter and a little brush. The water tank has a handle which is very convenient for refilling the water tank. It produces a great amount of mist for such a small machine, and I like how you can control the amount of mist that comes out. There is also a window on the side that shows how much water is left. Also, when there is no water left it shuts off automatically. Overall the humidifier is well designed and convenient. I highly recommend this humidifier for your home.
customer_reviews.author: CHIH HAO HU

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect until you wanna refill it
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - External design - Adjustable button Cons: - Refill process is a disaster. No matter how hard you push two parts together when you are trying to turn it upside down it still leaks like a waterfall. - The handle is useless cuz there's no any kind of buckle or leak-proof thing between those two parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow, it messes with our natural gas even!
customer_reviews.text: This thing pumps out some serious humidity. I'm extremely impressed! It's strong enough to where its messing with the balance of air/gas with our gas stovetop range (emits an orange flame instead of blue everytime we have the humidifier going). The water tank lasted us at least two nights so far on high, which is crazy. That's some serious water in the air! Goodbye scratchy nose from a dry winter night.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have several humidifiers in my home because I live in a very dry climate, including an older model made by TaoTronics. This one is very easy to use, primarily because the reservoir is well-sized and doesn't get too heavy when full. The device works fine and keeps a moderate-sized room reasonably humidified. The price is quite reasonable, and if it lasts as long as the earlier model (going on three years of daily use in the winter) I will be very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Love This Quiet Little Humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: This is the quietest humidifier we have ever owned. Even quieter than high-end humidifiers purchased at Brookstone. It is filter-free, which is a must for me! The last humidifier we bought had a filter that got black mold only after a few months of use. Love this quiet, filter-free, humidity producing machine!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Meyer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this recently and I love how quiet it is and how simple it is to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Very strong mist
customer_reviews.text: This company is amazing. This humidifier was terrific, so quiet, I could not hear a thing, but possibly because the size of my room I could not get the low humidity to budge even one degree after running for 3 days. I was really hopeful to help with extremely dry skin in the NE winter. Had to return it for only that reason but as you can see in the picture there is a lot of moisture from this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Adams

customer_reviews.title: i love this product!
customer_reviews.text: i like everything about this humidifer. i use it with distilled water and have no residue at all. very low noise, works quite well indeed. highly recommend this product. dry air breeds viruses, don't go a single winter without one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Libal

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: What a nice small unit! Even though I have only used it once, I am giving it 5 stars. Whisper quiet on all settings and in just a short time raised my humidity level from 48 to 52% in my bedroom. Very easy to fill and I do not see any issue when time to clean it. I am very receptive to noise while sleeping and this was near my bedside and I could not hear it running. Will update my review if I encounter any difficulties after using it more often.
customer_reviews.author: LES

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier works well, the mist is fine, there's no sound, it looks cool, it's great. The humidification effect is good, no longer feel dry at night, and the filter core, great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is amazing. I've gone through a humidifiers had yucky filters and none of them lasted longer than a year. This humidifier is so great for so many reasons. The sound is quiet, so you can actually sleep with it on. It's easy to fill because it has a handle, and it holds a lot of water. The spout that you can adjust at the top makes it so much easier! And I feel that it doesn't go through water as fast as the others I had. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I admit I just got the product today but so pleased with it. The packaging looked like an Apple product. I turned it on and it was super powerful and quiet. The unit is attractive. I can’t say how durable it is but so far I am really impressed and would definitely recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect humidifier for any room! Really simple to use and looks great on my desk. I got this to help my plant grow and so far have no complaints. The noise level is very low and hardly noticeable. I set it around 40% and the tank seems to last a couple days which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier in mid May and it had worked great until mid July when it suddenly stopped working. The red indicator light is always on even when the water tank is filled with water. I tried troubleshooting it after reading the manual, but it didn't help. I emailed the customer support of the manufacturer and they responded the same day. They are sending me a replacement unit and I hope it works longer than the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe Material, Causing respiratory disease
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine, but the water tank has a strong smell. After the first use, I try to refill the water, when I open the cap, smells very fishy, and the water become a little sticky, the mist smell bad too. it never happen with my previous humidifier.I clean it with detergent, the smell is still there. I highly doubt the problem is from the humidifier’s material, it is a cheap plastic, I noticed that it already recycle by 7 times. I’m not sure this is the only one or anyone experience the same thing with this Humidifier? This product make my thyroid problems worse!! Not safe not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: hupo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with the product. My skin get much better, softer and feel great to touch. I personally lazy on applying lotion during daytime, but when machine is on, my skin feel moist and soft, I don't really want to put on extra stuff on my flawless skin. The humidifier last pretty long with 1 time refill. I ve been using for 2 months, turn on everyday, The machine is strong and not smell like chemicals. It's white and good decor for my bedroom. I would order one more for my mom for Christmas. It worth $45.
customer_reviews.author: Th. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Excellent humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for half month already, I have to say this one much better than the previous one I had, very quiet also you can view water level on the side light indicator, big tank enough for whole day and night, I highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: yinghui li

customer_reviews.title: Sent broken and possibly used
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to receive this but was shocked when i opened it and saw it looked like it was slightly used. I didn’t care all that much so decided to try it out. I filled it and tried to turn it on but nothing. The led light didn’t turn on, no mist came out.... extremely disappointed. I did have great help in ordering a replacement that’s supposed to arrive tomorrow. We shall see if this one works.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle S

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to clean. I started seeing dark green/black stuff in the diffuser tank (probably mold). The little brush that comes with the humidifier barely does anything when it comes to cleaning. Since I haven't been able to clean the mold off, I've put it away and stopped using it
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and No Light!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best humidifier I’ve bought. I’ve had to buy them yearly because the others ran out of water too quickly or was too loud or too bright or their small pieces fell out and were missing...oh and the mold that grows in crevices you can’t get to. FINALLY a humidifier that doesn’t wake me up from sound or light. I’m certain it will only need to be filled once a week, I’m on night three and it’s still half full. And it’s very easy to fill and clean.
customer_reviews.author: EShaff

customer_reviews.title: Nice model
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. No leaks. No messes. Puts out a lot of steam, but we always use the high setting. We have a home water softener, but we've chosen to use bottled distilled water for now, so there's no chance of clogging it up with that white powdery stuff. Hopefully it will last a long time. We fill and only run it when we bed down at nighT. We shut the doors to keep the humidity contained. It will put out stream for a good 9-10 hours. I especially appreciate the sleek style. Doesn't interfere with my decor. Thanks for that.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Earrings

customer_reviews.title: Highest Quality Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Excellent humidifier for any room in your house, it's super quiet, has a large water tank so it lasts awhile and no filters to deal with. Friendly advice: Unfiltered tap water, leaves mineral deposits that can promote bacterial growth in the humidifier, and you will also be breathing them as they are dispersed into the air. I buy distilled water so there's no cleaning necessary. You can buy distilled water at any of your local grocery shops or invest in a water distiller, check out the ROVSUN Countertop Water Distiller Machine All Stainless Steel Interior with 4L BPA-Free Container, Home Distilled Water Purifier Filter, add the 5% coupon for extra savings.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyne

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity humidifier that works well
customer_reviews.text: Large capacity will stay on for days if you let it run most of the time. I use it all night and anytime I am in our bedroom. Its whisper quiet mostly. However, it does this loud gulp noise every so often that can wake light sleepers up. All in all a good value for a nice humidifier. Looks really nice as well. Puts out a lot of vapor or a little and easily adjusts.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mellecker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: Earlier I posted a one star review about this item. I’d like to note that TaoTronic customer service replaced the humidifier with a replacement that works wonderfully, but the real star in this transaction is the Customer Service that I experienced it truly made what appeared to be a bad purchase into a great experience and they are the true 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Tacoma15

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic, does-the-job humidifier, and a quality example of the species. It's quite compact, and as other reviewers have noted, makes a good nightstand humidifier. While nothing with a fan can be truly silent, it's pretty dern quiet. I really only notice the sound if my head's RIGHT next to it. It's easy to fill and runs a respectable while on a tankful. There's just one control, the dial on the front. While that means it's not exactly featuriffic, that's not what this humidifier is aiming for, and the simplicity is nice. It does one thing, and does it quite well, especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Gigaloaf

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work right and customer service didn't help.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I wanted to like this humidifier. It looks good and had a wide mouth for filling it with water. The problem is it didn't work well. Basically water constantly bubbled up into the mist exhaust, which made it noisier than it should've been. This also has the effect of making barely any mist come out. I had to turn it all the way up to get a decent amount. The worst part is I contacted their customer service and they said this was "normal"! Really?! Returned.
customer_reviews.author: T. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and effective
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product due to following reasons: - Quite - Easy to clean - Powerful - Auto shut feature - Small and portable which makes it very convenient This product is so good, as it humidifies the room pretty quickly without any noice and is powerful. It is very easy to clean and being small and portable, it is very convenientas a user point of view. Also comes with the removable filter, which cleans the air which it intakes and filter itself is reusable after wash. Price point of this product is well justified and I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ripul Shah

customer_reviews.title: Broke in first week
customer_reviews.text: First one stopped working within a week, just squealed. Amazon replaced for free. However, the fill tank design is also poor. Every time I lift it off the base, it drips all over (it can't be filled without lifting the tank off the base). Also, cannot use essential oils with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Randall Jackson

customer_reviews.title: great humidifier but...
customer_reviews.text: It really is a good humidifier but I have two slight complaints with it. One is it says the nozzle rotates but mine doesn't rotate at all. Thankfully it is pointed to the center front so not a major problem for me. The other is that it says best to have the humidity at 40-60% but no way to tell what the humidity is in the room
customer_reviews.author: tman

customer_reviews.title: A quiet, but very weak humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This is the weakest humidifier we've used. It shoots vapors straight up, so it has to fill up the entire room before we notice any change. We stuck a hygrometer (one we owned before and similar to the one they provide) on top of the humidifier (but not directly over the hole) and ran the device on MAX for 3 hours straight. The meter didn't change a single percent. I later ran it again for several hours in our smallest restroom, and the hygrometer went up 5%. In comparison, taking a 5-minute shower without the fan shoots it up 30%. And at the lowest setting, we barely feel any vapors from the top of the device. It's just really weak.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Very loud!
customer_reviews.text: I have read the reviews about how quiet it is and it simply is not true. It makes excesive noise and kept my son awake. I have another one from honeywell and its 100times quieter. I returned the item and i dont recommend it if you are looking for something used at night.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my 2nd review. I wrote my 1st review after receiving this humidifier and giving it a poor review because it wouldn't turn on. I returned it to Amazon. In the meantime, someone behind the scenes with this brand wrote me and automatically shipped me a new one. It works better than expected. Its super-quiet, efficient, and its large water tank actually makes it through 2 nights instead of just one. I am enjoying it very much and highly recommend it. Plus, their customer service in handling my previous review was very, very impressive Great job Tao-Tronics!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hyman

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Having just used my new TaoTronics Cool Mist Humidifier TT-AH024 (Grey) overnight for the first time, I can report that it worked as expected delivering at least 30% humidity overnight. I prefer this TT-AH024 (Grey) model for the being able to constantly see the water level...even from a distance and the manual controls. I believe the manual control when used with a separate hygrometer, measuring temperature & humidity, is more accurate as the hygrometer can be placed near where I expect to be rather than measure the conditions at the humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wing

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: {Update} The seller reached out to me and sent me a new humidifier and I haven't had any issues with it. It's exactly what I needed and works perfect. Thank you! Mine isn't working. I have had it for about three months now and the entire time I've had it after going for a couple of hours, water starts pouring out of it and ends up everywhere and I have it on a flat surface and I make sure it's on all the way. I don't know what's wrong with it. I'm just really upset I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier actually works really well for the bedroom! When the air gets drier I always wake-up with a really dry mouth. Since I started using this humidifier I don't get dry mouth anymore and I sleep so much better! My husband doesn't snore as much either. It is really easy to fill with water and it lasts a lot longer than my other humidifier. The controls are easy to use and it stays pretty quiet. Just enough white noise to actually help us sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Mel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and no spill! Lasts forever without refills
customer_reviews.text: Love how small this product is as well as how easy it is to use. I remember using a humidifier 10 years ago and them being noisy and using up water within a couple of hours! This small thing is amazing and will last what seems like forever (also depends on how high or low you have your humidifier set). It doesn't spill everywhere when you try to connect the water supply to the base, another beautiful thing I love about technology. Hated those humidifiers I used to use growing up but this one is absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: C.K.

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but be careful when flipping it upside down
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is humidifier is easy to use. It was so specific in the instructions of where to put it (off the ground, but not too high so you can refill it without moving it), so it took me a while to get it placed right. The only negative is when you flip it upside down to refill the tank, a disc falls out that is used to position where the steam goes in the room, so I have to be careful. I haven't cleaned mine yet, so I don't know how easy it is to do that, but I really like it so far after using it for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: NZ

customer_reviews.title: Big water tank, powerful mist
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good quality quiet humidifier for a good price. This one is well built and mist can be very powerful if you put it to the max. It’s definitely not very quiet you can hear it when it’s 6-10 fit away but, even though I like a complete silence during my rest, this humidifier doesn’t bother me with the amount of noise it produces, I got used to it very quickly. After 2 weeks of using it switch stoped working in off position, it’s still was working. Send it for a replacement. Will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay S.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Northern Colorado. We have low humidity here. I work at home and have (19) Orchid plants in my office that need 50% - 55% RH. I'm able to keep the RH at 50 - 52% no problem with the Tao Tronics Humidifier. It's easy to clean and virtually noiseless. With two computers and three large monitors the office can get warm and very dry, especially in the summer months. I've enjoyed having this unit as it works to a "TEE". I recommend it to anyone needing to raise the humidity level in their home.
customer_reviews.author: N.O. De Ques

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST perfect - way too noisy
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is almost perfect! It has a sleek design, it’s elevated so any moisture under it dries out and doesn’t mold, and it’s pretty easy to clean and take apart. However, I use this in my bedroom to sleep - and it is LOUD. Our last humidifier was much quieter and the lowest setting was also lower than on this one, so it lasted longer as well. This one I use on the lowest setting and by night 3-4 it’s ready for a refill. Overall, it’ll do until I’m sold on another but I’m pretty disappointed in this model.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: High Output Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I have a large whole-house humidifier but my bedroom is at the end of the house and never gets humid enough. To test this humidifier, I turned off my other one and let this run at 100%. It was able to bring the room up from 30% RH to about 55% RH overnight, this is also with the door open. So yes it works well and is quiet. I wish it had a digital control but I trust external humidity meters more anyways. For a small little humidifier I didn't expect great performance out of it, but I'm glad it worked out!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Dube

customer_reviews.title: Used for post tonsillectomy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically to keep my room with decent humidity while I recovered from tonsillectomy, which I've heard is brutal as an adult, and this has been amazing. I normally woke up, before owning this, with very dry throat and nose. Since purchasing it's been a completely different story, no dry sore throat feeling, even during the recovery process from tonsillectomy. I am very glad I purchased this humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied with the Product
customer_reviews.text: I am putting this review after a month of daily usage. and as many i am very satisfied with the product. This Product surely has lot of USP comparing to the competitors and the price point. 1. Very Sophisticated and Sleek Design. 2. Easy to clean, specially the tank and the tiny brush comes with it helps very much for a daily cleanup. 3. The noise is comparatively very less. 4. The Nozzle for the humid air does an excellent job throttling it higher for better coverage. 5. The filter at the bottom gives some safe approach on the air pulled to the humidifier. 6. The Overall price point is very competitive with all the features.
customer_reviews.author: Aurobinda

customer_reviews.title: Great and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like the simple and clear design that it blends into the interior nicely. The mist is very fine and cold. It really helped improve my dry skin and throat. The noise level is acceptable and hardly noticed when placed in the living area. When used in a quiet bedroom, the hissing noise might be a bit obvious for sensitive people. I keep it in the living room and it’s perfect there. The reservoir is big enough that 1 liter of water can already last for a whole day with medium speed.
customer_reviews.author: YH Wu

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and easy to run
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was for my Mom who keeps it running24/7 with out cleaning it so within a couple weeks some pink coating had formed on some inner parts (water mold?). Extremely quiet and effective. Easy to turn on. Mom dropped the twist on cap and then couldn't figure out why it wouldn't run after wards. The rubber gasket that goes BELOW the threads on the lid had flipped up to cover some of the threads so the water basin wouldn't sit flat, so it wouldn't run. Flipped the gasket back flat and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier - everything is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I wish I hadn't bought a smaller one first but 2 of this. I use it every night for a few hours and I only have to refill it after 5 days. The refill is easy thanks to the handle. Only small problem is that it drips and I need to remember to get a towel before picking it up. Besides that, the rest of the product is great. It looks good, the knob let you choose the amount of steam, the refill is easy and so is the cleaning. Will definitively buy another one when I need to replace the smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Marcillaud

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: We use humidifiers in both kids room almost every night during the winter months. The humidifier was such a good design and price that I bought one for each room. They are fairly large rooms at about 15'x15' and this makes a very noticeable difference with one running. The large opening makes it easy it fill and clean. The unit does not have any bright lights to keep you up at night. The unit does not have an overly complicated display for kids to play with and break. I am very happy with this humidifier and will definitely buy it again and recommend it to any of my parent friends looking for humidifiers.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Only had this humidifier for a couple nights but it’s made a big difference already. I sleep with a fan going for the noise so to me it’s very quiet but I like a loader white noise usually anyhow. Easy to fill. Has little brush included to clean tight spots. Ran on medium first night higher on second night and it still has about a quarter of the water in basin. Also the small light on it isn’t bright at all. I’m light sensitive when I sleep and this doesn’t effect me. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good functionality, would opt for white instead of black
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean was number one factor in choosing a humidifier. It’s definitely easy to clean, runs without virtually any noise. It’s capacity is enough for the whole 24 hours on the highest setting. The only thing that I mind is that because it’s black, all the fingerprints and white foggy layer is very visible. I should have got a white one, but wanted a black one to have it blend in with the furniture. Other than that - a very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: This product works like a charm, it is very quiet and produce great mist and great volume too with controller to let you adjust. I had a few of the same product from different manufacturers, one of the key decision for me based on my experience using different product is ease of cleaning. This products has a wide mouth that let your hand completely get inside the tank to clean it and the design of the tank also let you clean it up cleaner than other products I had in the past. Those other products always had some part of the inside of the tank that you just can't clean because you can't reach it.
customer_reviews.author: yunita setiawan

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, not perfect, but good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet. Even when I set mine at max and run it constantly in my bedroom, it will only get the humidity from about 15-20% up to about 40%. And running it that high requires a fill every 1-2 days. Update 4/15: I have now had my humidifier for a few months and while I felt it wasn’t 5 stars, I have been very pleased with their customer service in wanting to get it right and/or refund me if I was still not happy with it. I really appreciate the extra effort in their part to offer good services. So now, I would give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and quiet enough for a sleeping newborn
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace another similar humidifier which worked well, but was nearly impossible to clean. The biggest draw for me was the wide opening for the large water tank, so I can put in my entire hand to wipe down the inside every week. Our newborn had some congestion for a few days, so the humidifier really helped, and it was quiet enough that it didn't disturb her sleep, even on the max setting. I did way too much research because of the variety of options available for humidifiers at various price points, but this one seems to hit all of the marks; price, ease of use and cleaning, quietness, and tank capacity.
customer_reviews.author: HWLesq

customer_reviews.title: che k when its o. That water doesn't come out
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning it was working perfectly. I cleaned it with the small brush inside, add water again. The water was coming out from the bottom. I cleaned again, it happened the same way... the water was coming out from the bottom ...
customer_reviews.author: Claudia De La Parra

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My house is so. dry. Like, it hurts my nose. Buffalo winters are rough. I needed another humidifier. I already own a different model by this brand and have been really happy with it so when I saw this one pop up, seemed like a no brainer. I really appreciate how quiet it is. I wish it were slightly bigger, but that's my own fault for not realizing it wasn't the same size as my other one. It is big enough to last the day/ night. And sleek looking.
customer_reviews.author: SarahElle

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier for large rooms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a week ago and have used it nonstop since then. My previous humidifier made a "glug-glug" sound as the water level went down. This humidifier does not do this; it makes a virtually -undetectable sound while running so I can keep it on all night. It is easy to fill and the water level lasts a few days, depending on whether you have it on the high, medium or low setting. No leaks, no problems. Loving it, helps a great deal for my congestion.
customer_reviews.author: Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Helps to have good deep sleep
customer_reviews.text: Awesome humidifier! Ever since we got this, we have been having good deep sleep. It’s very quiet, and I love that dusts don’t stick to it. I could feel the change in the air in our bedroom ever since we use this. It feels like I could breathe better and the mist coming out of this is just helpful for that. It has auto-shut off if you want to save energy and have peace of mind about it overheating or something. Overall happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Leaked water.. Seller gave full refund.
customer_reviews.text: Update..Seller gave refund for item. Will be ordering newer model that doesn't have the design flaw. This is a great buy for the price; however, every time you have to pick it up to refill it, you will get water everywhere. The water leaks from the top, do not just flip it over and carry it by the handle because the adjustment nozzle will fall off, plus water will leak all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeQueen

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, quick and responsive support
customer_reviews.text: This unit meets my needs. I like sufficient capacity, transparent tank, quiet work, tiny-tiny light that doesn't wake up at night, large inlet, simple design that allows to clean it quickly. What's more valuable, is a really quick and responsive support. I got what appeared to be a defective unit. However, it literally took a week from submitting a claim via email until a new unit came to my room. No extra questions, no back and forth. Great job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several cheaper humidifiers and have been disappointed in them. Seemed like it was time to try a better quality one. So far, this one has not disappointed and has worked well. I like that it has a large tank opening so it will be easy to clean. It makes a little noise while running but not much. It seems to work well and helped when our kids had colds. I'm receiving a free accessory for leaving a review, but I like this humidifier and would have given it 5 stars anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Works well as long as I clean it about 2x a week. It's very quiet, and I had zero problems sleeping. Cleaning it is a bit of a hassle since the tank doesn't come fully apart and the vapor director seems to be one solid piece with a hole. Otherwise, it's easy to use. I get two nights on a full tank with a medium-high setting. Definitely gets points for the contemporary look.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, pretty quiet
customer_reviews.text: I bought the earlier version of Taotronics humidifer 2 years ago and this is my second purchase. Compare to the previous model, this new one is definitely easier to clean which is for me a BIG plus. It is also much more quiet than the previous one. The only reason I don't give it a five star was because the mist that comes out is not as heavy as the previous model, but it's not really a big deal since I use it in a small to moderate room. Overall I would recommend this product for its easy cleaning and affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Mia W.

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good :)
customer_reviews.text: had it for about 3 weeks now. super easy to use. theres a little noise coming out of it when its dialed up past the halfway mark, but you can barely hear it from about 3 ft away. easy to clean since they put that large opening in the tank. glad they didnt put a super bright led on it. the one it has is visible but doesnt bother me like the last one (it was practically a night light).
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: We love this- works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great humidifier! Super simple to set up, use, and clean. We buy a new humidifier every winter as they get grungy and it is so important to keep them clean so they don’t put bacteria into the air so we have tried many different humidifiers- this one is the best we’ve found if you don’t care about a lot of fancy digital readings - we’ve found the simpler the better and this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I wanted a humidifier for my bedroom bc I get SO DRY in the winter. This baby is awesome. Honestly, I should’ve gotten a bigger size because it runs out of water quickly bc I use it so much. But I don’t mind refilling it- about every other day. I’m so happy I have this product by my bedside. Saves me. Plus I like the modern look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: RSEH

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!! I need more
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!! I LOVE this humidifier. It’s amazing and the kids sleep through the night with this baby! It rounds all night long and there’s still some water left over in the morning. I was so hesitant on muting on of these things because of all the bad reviews flying around but I would definitely buy one for my bedroom too. It does work better in a medium size room.. the kids room is perfect. My room may need two! But worth it to sleep through the night!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: So quiet!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband cannot sleep with any background noise, so it has been a chore trying to find a truly quiet humidifier. I was skeptical at how they advertised that this device is as quiet as a library- but it really is! Despite the occasional bubble gurgle it is sooooo quiet. It is also REALLY easy to clean, the opening is big enough to stick your hand in the water tank and scrub around. Worth the value and works amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: K Miller

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It blows white dust everywhere I was under the impression it didn't do this. It is noisy whoever states it isn't cant hear very well, I have a hearing problem and I can hear it, the light on it bothers my sleep and it had a really bad plastic odor that didn't resolve the cleaning the inside
customer_reviews.author: nano 1

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy purchase with this brand. It's VERY QUIET and the light adds a nice touch and a soft ambient glow. Also it will last up to so much Hours on the lowest of three setting. Cleaning is etramely easy and easy to settlement. I have 2kids, it's helping my kids's nose not so dry, making it great for bedroom.Overall, I highly recommend this fine ultrasound humidifier, quiet, effective, and reasonably price. I am very satisfied with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Whisper quiet humidity for healthy environment.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this humidifier to provide better environment for my aging African Grey parrot. The climate out west is very dry and it was adversely affecting my parrots skin, not to mention my own! Filled it up and plugged it in, and both of us are extremely happy with the effects. The humidifier is very easy to clean and fill, not to mention it is whisper quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Leila V

customer_reviews.title: Tooky Navaroli says :)
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is quiet, well constructed and holds sufficient water to last well over 10 hours on the highest setting. I am using distilled water only. In my opinion, the additional cost is off set by the total lack of mineral build up which means there's no need for cleaning/descaling the unit. Ever. :)
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schmoe

customer_reviews.title: Love Taotronics Humidifiers!
customer_reviews.text: This style of humidifier is sleek and easy to fill. We use in our living and dining room area. It stays clean- we do scrub about once every two weeks. We also use the humidifier pucks for tap water from Taotronics. They work great. It’s a quiet humidifier. It drips when refilling from condensation so just have a towel at the ready. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan Chad

customer_reviews.title: Finally own a non-medical-y looking humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: Besides looking sleek and clean (we ordered the black), the cool mist is important to us because the warm mist humidifiers of our past have created a jungle like environment. This humidifier works wonders... it starts working right away, doesn't make a sound and its easy to aim the mist in any direction. There's also a really great feature which is the attached handle which make for really easy use. This humidifier is simple and not expensive and does the job. Even if it broke down the road, I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleeping at night!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, honestly makes a soothing noise! It's a little large but that's kind of what I signed up for. Definitely easier to clean than the ones that are curvy and cute. I dig that it has a handle on top of the tank so you can carry it other places to empty or fill. Still trying to find the best way to let it air out during the day, but otherwise, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Definitely what the doctor ordered for me...
customer_reviews.text: For months I have woken up with desert-level dry sinuses, hacking and coughing until I chugged a bottle or two of water. I eventually hit the end of my rope and decided I needed a humidifier. Setting up this model was easy! The tank is huge and so far I've had no issue using just plain tap water. I fill it every night as part of my bedtime ritual but I could easily let it run all night at least two days in a row without refilling. It's perfectly quiet, too. The best part is waking up feeling normal again. Very happy purchaser here that will be looking into more products for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for !
customer_reviews.text: I was using an oval shaped humidifier earlier and used to struggle to fill water and align in properly. Also I had to fill it up frequently (and I stop using it after sometime due to this reason). Then I came across this humidifier and this has been perfect for me. It is easy to carry to fill up the water and also has a large tank. And it looks cool in black :)
customer_reviews.author: Naren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: It is quiet and easy to use. I think the only thing I would change is that you have to fill from the bottom. I gave it to my parents and they LOVE it. We live in the dry desert of Arizona and a humidifier in the summer is a must! This little one works great - better than the old big bulky ones - and is extremely quiet and easy yo use. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: TucsonBizGirl

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this several times when my daughter was sick and her nose kept drying out. I was afraid she would get nose bleeds. The place we live in is naturally dry and that's always a concern. Simple instructions, easy to clean and use--no complaints. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a good sized humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Super quiet, it produces good amount of mist, and its super easy to clean. I love it. The only small thing I don’t like about it is the plastic piece where mist comes out. Its hard to turn and redirect the mist because its just a flat surface. It needs a small piece that extends out so you can turn it easily. I also wish the ugly yellow sticker was easier to remove. But overall I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: good product but...
customer_reviews.text: i like the product. but there is a catch for me. i know it's better to use with distilled water. but when you want to clean it or replace water, you have to hold the top part and the bottom part together. also water gets stuck on the bottom part which i didn't like much. there are some areas where it's hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and constructed
customer_reviews.text: I've owned and used several humidifiers. This is the best one of the total group. It is easy to use and to refill with a nice, large screw cap opening. It is relatively easy to clean but the unit has parts that are difficult to reach with the little brush that is supplied. The plastic material used is smooth and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: J.M. Lesko

customer_reviews.title: It is quiet!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this based on the 26dB and it delivered. We replaced our brand-name humidifier and this is definitely more quieter. It's efficient and the mist is good. 4L is definitely a plus so we don't have fill water everyday. Operation is simple, rotary knob for adjustment and a soft click as you turn to off and on. White with white LED blends in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: DVA

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. First, it’s Aesthetically pleasing. It’s very sleek which I really like. There is zero noise. You are able to choose the direction you want it to blow which is a great! I was getting extremely chapped lips and have been searching and searching for remedies. Someone mentioned a humidifier. I read the reviews and decided to give this one a try. I’m so glad I did! Within a few days my lip problem was completely gone. I’m sleeping better and I’ve noticed a huge change in the dryness of my skin. Another Bonus is it seems to be helping with my allergies? I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: We like it.
customer_reviews.text: I refused to allow the old huge noisy messy humidifier back into the living room this fall. We have the Taotronics humidifier next to the piano to help maintain proper humidity. It is small, quiet and easy to maintain. In really cold weather it can’t maintain the humidity at 40%. We have a second, identical Taotronics in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: KEVTC

customer_reviews.title: Product lives up to its descriiption
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my humidifier for a few days and it works perfectly. It was easy to fill. No leaking! The dial for the mist was perfect. I hope it will last for a long time. It is sooo quiet. Love that feature and no light to interfere with your sleep. I will clean it after a week of use as directed. The parts are very easy to take apart and re-assemble. I would highly recommend this product at this point. The warranty for 18 months tells you the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Hits all the marks!
customer_reviews.text: There is a fan which is very quiet. Wide opening for easy access for cleaning (Two teaspoons of cheap vodka added to a full tank helps keep it clean). Even though it is larger, it is shaped to fit in many spaces. I especially like that it is see-through. I can see that itis clean. And you can watch the mist being created!
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than competitors and has a handle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my current cool humidifier, my crane humidifier has a crack with small leak in the basin. So far it works just as well and was cheaper than the crane humidifier. I also like that this basin has a handle for easy carry. It still fills from bottom of basin but when right side up it doesn’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amy brunet

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product So Far
customer_reviews.text: We have had this humidifier for a few months now. So far, we are quite pleased. Unlike prior versions we've had, this one works well and is pretty easy to refill and clean. We also really like the sleek design and as a result, I don't mind having it on the bedroom bureau. Overall, we give this four thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: SSG

customer_reviews.title: On trend design, super quite.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my last humidifier from Honeywell died after 2 years. Very impressed with the design, but I was a little skeptical about how long it will last since the tank looks smaller than the one we had in the past. Having used it every night for about 2 weeks now, I think it actually runs about 18 hours even with highest setting, which is again, impressive. On top to that, this humidifier is super quite. Works perfectly for overnight use during sleep hours.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier with a Modern Look!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sleek look of this humidifier. My daughter previously had a kid’s princess humidifier which was cute, but it leaked everywhere. This one does not leak and has a huge tank. The instructions say it has 30 hours of water, but I’m on hour 48 and it is still working. Super easy to fill and to keep an eye on the water level.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ligocki

customer_reviews.title: Good, quite humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Really nice humidifier, very little noise but not annoying, usually i turn off humidifiers before going to sleep because of the noise but this one stays on whole night, and the water last for very long, was on whole night and only 1/4 water was used and i used it athighest level of mist. Mist is very good, you can arrange the level.
customer_reviews.author: otherthing85

customer_reviews.title: Very Sleek and Compact Nifty Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: First off I love the design of the humidifier, it has a modern, sleek look that fits well within my bedroom. It's very easy to set up - no instructions needed. The large tank fits a lot of water and has a helpful handle for carrying. The humidifier works well and is whisper quiet. Its exactly what I needed to keep my skin from getting dry during the cold months. Very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L

customer_reviews.title: Died before first year up.
customer_reviews.text: Although I loved this humidifier at first, I haven’t had it a full year yet and it has already stopped working. I tried to get in contact with the manufacturer but I can’t find their contact information anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra R Marsden

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: The TaoTronics Cool Mist Humidifier has greatly improved the air quality in my bedroom. Excellent quality! The humidifier is super quiet, which is a plus. I purchased the black one. It looks nice and matches my bedroom decor. This humidifier is actually bigger than I expected which is a postive. The best feature is the ability to direct which way the mist comes out of the unit. Definitely a good buy, I would recommend this product. Last but not least, the follow up email from the company with instructions on how to best use the humidifier was a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: The Gaddie Family

customer_reviews.title: Other Brands, same product is cheaper
customer_reviews.text: This product works great but I recently saw that there are other brands on Amazon that are offering the exact same product for less money. This brand probably just stuck their logo on an order from a Chinese factory along with the other companies selling the exact same product.
customer_reviews.author: Neha Ketkar

customer_reviews.title: No more oil diffusers for me
customer_reviews.text: I ended up ditching my smaller oil diffuser which barely let off much mist . This machine definitely packs a punch for a large mist level that lasts pretty long. Very low key hum noise and that is about it. Very good value if you want more moisture in your bedroom and what not.
customer_reviews.author: Nate,  Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great except is barely raises the Humidity
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, because the design is pretty, it’s easy to clean, carry and fill. The opening is big enough to fit your entire hand so you can clean it well. But it just doesn’t produce enough humidity. At maximum strength it raised the humidity in my room 3-4%. My other humidifier can raise it 10-15% and it’s half the size. I know because I have a humidity sensor in my room. I love how big the tank is, at medium it can probably last 2-3 day’s. At max strength it’s about 24 hours for me. However again, the increase in Humidity at Max strength just isn’t there! Might need a more powerful fan?
customer_reviews.author: Mari E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This cool mist humidifier is of great quality. It is easy to use, disassemble and clean. The mist is strong and lasts all night and is quiet which is great for restful sleep. It also has an auto shut off which is nice. It really is great in keeping the room ventilated. Good for those with nasal congestion and for babies. It is also very compact and easy to carry around. Good quality product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Bought for my twins but gave it to my toddler instead. (One twin needs it and the other twin gets gnarly boogers from it). Its super quiet, still noise but not loud and barely noticable. Only downfall is you cant use smelly stuff in it but I dont mind. Its definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: MamaKar3

product_meta.title: Humidifiers, TaoTronics Cool Mist Humidifiers for Bedroom, 4L 26dB Quiet Humidifiers with 12-50 Hours of Run Time, Nano-Coating, Ultra Quiet, Easy to Clean, 360° Nozzle, Auto Shut-Off (White)
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteWarm Tips 1. Please do not add any essential oils into the humidifier.2. Please do not place this product on carpets or towels, which might block the air inlet and shorten the mist. 3. The most comfortable environmental humidity is between 40%-60%. Please adjust the mist as you need. If humidity is too high, please do not use this product. Technical Specifications:Model: TT-AH024 WhiteOperating Voltage: AC 100-120V 50 / 60HzRated Power: 15-25WWater Tank Capacity: 4. 0L / 1. 06GalMist Output: 60-300ml/hWorking Time on a Full Tank: 12-50HRecommended Room Size: 20-40m / 215-430ft Dimensions: 10. 2 x 6. 5 x 13. 3in / 258 x 164 x 338mmNet Weight: 1350g / 47. 6ozPackage List: TaoTronics Humidifier (Model: TT-AH024) Cleaning Brush Dustproof Sponge User Guide
feature_bullets: WHISPER QUITE HUMIDIFIER: Humidifying the air at just 26dB of noise ensuring you get a more peace quiet atmosphere, perfect humidifier for bedroom, baby, kids, nursery and your home.

HUMIDIFIER FOR LARGE ROOM: With over 1.06 gallon of water, the cool mist humidifier lasts for 12-50 hour working time on a full tank; designed to humidify the air in large rooms up to 20-40 m² / 215-430 ft².

EASY TO CLEAN HUMIDIFIER: 92mm wide opening allows you to refill and clean the ultrasonic air humidifier with ease and convenience, ensures healthy air for your family. Built-in handle for convenient carrying.
POWERFUL MIST：The air humidifier delivers long-range mist via the 360 rotatable nozzle at a height of up to 2ft to efficiently humidify your room quietly and effectively.

AUTO SHUT-OFF HUMIDIFIER: The ultrasonic air humidifier will stop misting to prevent the device from overheating when the water is drained or when water tank is lifted. Dustproof sponge prevents dust from entering the humidifier with a lengthy life span.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,244 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: All taotronics humidifiers come with 18-month warranty . If you have any questions, please contact us and we will respond within 24 hours.
